
{{alias}}
    Regular expression to capture the last part of a path.

    The regular expression is platform-dependent. If the current process is
    running on Windows, the regular expression is `*.win32`; otherwise,
    `*.posix`.


{{alias}}.posix
    Regular expression to capture the last part of a POSIX path.

    Examples
    --------
    > var base = {{alias}}.exec( '/foo/bar/index.js' )[ 1 ]
    'index.js'


{{alias}}.win32
    Regular expression to capture the last part of a Windows path.

    Examples
    --------
    > var base = {{alias}}.exec( 'C:\\foo\\bar\\index.js' )[ 1 ]
    'index.js'

    See Also
    --------
